title: Is fear life's only absolute truth? Why or why not? - Quora

response.answer_text: No. Take an entry level philosophy class and you’ll be able to answer your own question in no time. Firstly, you’ll be asked to define “absolute truth”. Which will likely start a dialogue that could last all semester. Secondly, after you define it, IF you can define it, then you can replace the word “fear” with myriad other words. Like justice. Or hope. Or ennui. Or unknowing. Some people would input the word “God”. Inevitably, each answer can only lead to more questions. The answer to your question is no. To find out why has been debated over centuries. You’ll not get a satisfactory answer in this forum.
